cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dantei

sentence.kanji: まだ原因は断定できません。
sentence.romaji: mada genin ha dantei dekimasen
sentence.english: The cause has yet to be determined.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saisentan

sentence.kanji: そのカメラには最先端の技術が使われています。
sentence.romaji: sono kamera ni ha saisentan no gijutsu ga tsukawarete imasu
sentence.english: State-of-the-art technology is used in that camera.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sousa

sentence.kanji: この携帯電話は操作が簡単です。
sentence.romaji: kono keitai denwa ha sousa ga kantan desu
sentence.english: This cellular phone is easy to operate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nekasu

sentence.kanji: いつも9時に子供を寝かします。
sentence.romaji: itsumo 9 ji ni kodomo wo nekashimasu
sentence.english: I always put our kid to bed at nine o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nekaseru

sentence.kanji: 赤ちゃんをベッドに寝かせた。
sentence.romaji: akachan wo bedo ni nekaseta
sentence.english: I laid the baby down on the bed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nekorobu

sentence.kanji: 土手に寝転んで空をながめました。
sentence.romaji: dote ni nekoronde sora wo nagamemashita
sentence.english: I lay down on the bank and looked at the sky.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senyou

sentence.kanji: これは女性専用の車両です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha josei senyou no sharyou desu
sentence.english: This is a women-only carriage.

cards.english: managing two things, having it both ways
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryouritsu

sentence.kanji: 勉強と仕事の両立は難しいよ。
sentence.romaji: benkyou to shigoto no ryouritsu ha muzukashii yo
sentence.english: It's difficult to manage both study and work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryougawa

sentence.kanji: 道の両側にたくさんお店がありますよ。
sentence.romaji: michi no ryougawa ni takusan omise ga arimasu yo
sentence.english: There are a lot of shops on both sides of the road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furoku

sentence.kanji: 今月の付録はアニメのDVDです。
sentence.romaji: kongetsu no furoku ha anime no dei-bui-dei- desu
sentence.english: The free gift this month is an anime DVD.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikazukeru

sentence.kanji: 私は顔を窓に近付けたんだ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kao wo mado ni chikazuketa n da
sentence.english: I brought my face close to the window.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bushitsu

sentence.kanji: この製品は有害な化学物質を含んでいるわよ。
sentence.romaji: kono seihin ha yuugai na kagakubushitsu wo fukunde iru wa yo
sentence.english: This product contains a harmful chemical.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yourei

sentence.kanji: 用例を使って説明してください。
sentence.romaji: yourei wo tsukate setsumei shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please explain by using examples.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shubi

sentence.kanji: そのチームは守備が甘いね。
sentence.romaji: sono chi-mu ha shubi ga amai ne
sentence.english: The team's defense is soft.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's choumiryou

sentence.kanji: 塩、コショウはよく使われる調味料です。
sentence.romaji: shio koshou ha yoku tsukawareru choumiryou desu
sentence.english: Salt and pepper are commonly used seasonings.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikaku

sentence.kanji: 独身者パーティーを企画した。
sentence.romaji: dokushinsha pa-tei- wo kikaku shita
sentence.english: I made plans for a singles' party.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shufu

sentence.kanji: 主婦の主な仕事は家事よ。
sentence.romaji: shufu no omo na shigoto ha kaji yo
sentence.english: A housewife's main task is housework.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fujin

sentence.kanji: 婦人服売り場は5階でございます。
sentence.romaji: fujinfuku uriba ha 5 kai de gozaimasu
sentence.english: The ladies' clothing department is on the fifth floor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakyoku

sentence.kanji: この曲は誰が作曲したのですか。
sentence.romaji: kono kyoku ha dare ga sakyoku shita no desu ka
sentence.english: Who composed this tune?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's unyou

sentence.kanji: 会計士に資金運用について相談したよ。
sentence.romaji: kaikeishi ni shikin unyou ni tsuite soudan shita yo
sentence.english: I consulted an accountant about managing my assets.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utae

sentence.kanji: 彼女の訴えは認められたわ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no utae ha mitomerareta wa
sentence.english: Her complaint was admitted.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okasu

sentence.kanji: 他人の権利を侵してはなりません。
sentence.romaji: tanin no kenri wo okashiteha narimasen
sentence.english: You shouldn't infringe on other people's rights.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ateru

sentence.kanji: 彼はくじ引きで一等賞を当てたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kujibiki de itou shou wo ateta yo
sentence.english: He won the first prize in the lottery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shotoku

sentence.kanji: ここに去年の所得をご記入ください。
sentence.romaji: koko ni kyonen no shotoku wo go kinyuu kudasai
sentence.english: Please fill in last year's income here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaka

sentence.kanji: 彼の得意な学科は数学です。
sentence.romaji: kare no tokui na gaka ha suugaku desu
sentence.english: Math is his strong subject.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nenryou

sentence.kanji: 車から燃料がもれていますよ。
sentence.romaji: kuruma kara nenryou ga morete imasu yo
sentence.english: Fuel is leaking from the car.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meisho

sentence.kanji: ここは桜の名所です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha sakura no meisho desu
sentence.english: This place is well-known for cherry blossoms.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's geka

sentence.kanji: 友人が骨折して外科に入院しました。
sentence.romaji: yuujin ga kosetsu shite geka ni nyuuin shimashita
sentence.english: My friend broke a bone and was admitted to hospital for surgery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunseki

sentence.kanji: 今の経済の動きを分析しています。
sentence.romaji: ima no keizai no ugoki wo bunseki shite imasu
sentence.english: We're analyzing today's economic movements.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenkou

sentence.kanji: 健康が一番大切だ。
sentence.romaji: kenkou ga ichiban taisetsu da 。
sentence.english: The most important thing is your health.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hayane

sentence.kanji: 早寝は健康のためによいことです。
sentence.romaji: hayane ha kenkou no tame ni yoi koto desu
sentence.english: Going to bed early is good for your health.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naika

sentence.kanji: 内科で胃の調子を診てもらったよ。
sentence.romaji: naika de i no choushi wo mite morata yo
sentence.english: I had my stomach examined in the internal medicine department.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zu

sentence.kanji: 図を描いて説明しましょう。
sentence.romaji: zu wo kaite setsumei shimashou
sentence.english: Let me draw a diagram to explain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaka

sentence.kanji: この絵はスペインの画家が描きました。
sentence.romaji: kono e ha supein no gaka ga kakimashita
sentence.english: A Spanish painter drew this picture.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinshi

sentence.kanji: 彼は軽い近視です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha karui kinshi desu
sentence.english: He is slightly near-sighted.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iryou

sentence.kanji: その会社は衣料を扱っているんだ。
sentence.romaji: sono kaisha ha iryou wo atsukate iru n da
sentence.english: The company deals with clothing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakuya

sentence.kanji: 昨夜はテレビで喜劇を見たよ。
sentence.romaji: sakuya ha terebi de kigeki wo mita yo
sentence.english: I watched a comedy show on TV last night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kindai

sentence.kanji: 近代の技術の発展はものすごいです。
sentence.romaji: kindai no gijutsu no haten ha monosugoi desu
sentence.english: The development of technology in this modern age is truly amazing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shika

sentence.kanji: 彼は歯科医師です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shika ishi desu
sentence.english: He is a dentist.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuugeki

sentence.kanji: これから高齢化が急激に進みます。
sentence.romaji: korekara koureika ga kyuugeki ni susumimasu
sentence.english: The aging of the population will rapidly advance in the years ahead.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itarutokoro

sentence.kanji: コンビニは至る所にあります。
sentence.romaji: konbini ha itarutokoro ni arimasu
sentence.english: Convenience stores are everywhere.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shikyuu

sentence.kanji: 会社から「至急」との連絡があったんだ。
sentence.romaji: kaisha kara shikyuu to no renraku ga ata n da
sentence.english: The company contacted me on an "urgent" matter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinshitsu

sentence.kanji: 寝室の壁紙を張り替えました。
sentence.romaji: shinshitsu no kabegami wo harikaemashita
sentence.english: I repapered the bedroom walls.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gunji

sentence.kanji: 彼は軍事に関わる仕事を続けてきたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha gunji ni kakawaru shigoto wo tsuzukete kita n da
sentence.english: He kept working in a job related to military affairs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arasoi

sentence.kanji: その地域では争いが絶えません。
sentence.romaji: sono chiiki de ha arasoi ga taemasen
sentence.english: There are ceaseless conflicts in that region.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taeru

sentence.kanji: このビルは大地震に耐えられるでしょうか。
sentence.romaji: kono biru ha oojishin ni taerareru deshou ka
sentence.english: Would this building be able to withstand a large earthquake?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hashi

sentence.kanji: 辞書は本棚の端にあります。
sentence.romaji: jisho ha hondana no hashi ni arimasu
sentence.english: The dictionary is at the end of the bookshelf.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sentan

sentence.kanji: 棒の先端を持って下さい。
sentence.romaji: bou no sentan wo mote kudasai
sentence.english: Please hold the end of the stick.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotogara

sentence.kanji: これまで話し合った事柄をまとめてください。
sentence.romaji: kore made hanashiata kotogara wo matomete kudasai
sentence.english: Please summarize the things we have been talking about so far.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakusei

sentence.kanji: 合鍵の作製には2日ほどかかります。
sentence.romaji: aikagi no sakusei ni ha futsuka hodo kakarimasu
sentence.english: It takes about two days to make a duplicate key.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mushiba

sentence.kanji: 虫歯は予防できます。
sentence.romaji: mushiba ha yobou dekimasu
sentence.english: Tooth decay can be prevented.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suiji

sentence.kanji: うちでは夫も炊事をします。
sentence.romaji: uchi de ha oto mo suiji wo shimasu
sentence.english: In my house, my husband also cooks.
